languages.text: "Прошу, не здесь",{n} — почти шепчет Кассия. —{/n} "Разве дворянам не положено обсуждать подобные вещи вдали от слуг?"

traits.locale_text: "Прошу, не здесь",{n} — почти шепчет Кассия. —{/n} "Разве дворянам не положено обсуждать подобные вещи вдали от слуг?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"
languages.original_text: "Прошу, не здесь",{n} — почти шепчет Кассия. —{/n} "Разве дворянам не положено обсуждать подобные вещи вдали от слуг?"

traits.locale_text: "Not here, I am begging you,"{n} — Cassia is almost whispering. —{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not here, I am begging you,"{n} — Cassia is almost whispering. —{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “别在这里谈这件事情，求求你了。”{n}卡西娅的声音几乎像是耳语。{/n}“贵族不是应该在远离仆人的地方谈论事情吗？”
languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

traits.locale_text: “别在这里谈这件事情，求求你了。”{n}卡西娅的声音几乎像是耳语。{/n}“贵族不是应该在远离仆人的地方谈论事情吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

languages.text: «Aquí no, se lo ruego». {n}La voz de Cassia es apenas un susurro.{/n} «¿No se supone que los nobles hablan de estas cosas lejos del servicio?».
languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

traits.locale_text: «Aquí no, se lo ruego». {n}La voz de Cassia es apenas un susurro.{/n} «¿No se supone que los nobles hablan de estas cosas lejos del servicio?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「お願いですから、ここではやめてください」{n}カシアはささやくように言う。{/n}「貴族というものは、こういうことは使用人から離れた場所で話すものではないのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

traits.locale_text: 「お願いですから、ここではやめてください」{n}カシアはささやくように言う。{/n}「貴族というものは、こういうことは使用人から離れた場所で話すものではないのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht hier, ich flehe Euch an"{n}, sagt Cassia fast im Flüsterton.{/n} "Sollten Adlige so etwas nicht fern der Ohren der Bediensteten besprechen?"
languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht hier, ich flehe Euch an"{n}, sagt Cassia fast im Flüsterton.{/n} "Sollten Adlige so etwas nicht fern der Ohren der Bediensteten besprechen?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Pas ici, je vous en supplie, {n}dit Cassia à voix basse.{/n} Les nobles ne sont-ils pas censés aborder de tels sujets hors de portée des oreilles de leurs serviteurs ? »
languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

traits.locale_text: « Pas ici, je vous en supplie, {n}dit Cassia à voix basse.{/n} Les nobles ne sont-ils pas censés aborder de tels sujets hors de portée des oreilles de leurs serviteurs ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Yalvarırım burada konuşmayalım." {n}Cassia neredeyse fısıldayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Soyluların böyle meseleleri hizmetkârlardan uzakta tartışması gerekmez mi?"
languages.original_text: "Not here, I'm begging you," {n}Cassia says in an almost whisper.{/n} "Aren't noblemen supposed to discuss such things away from the servants?"

traits.locale_text: "Yalvarırım burada konuşmayalım." {n}Cassia neredeyse fısıldayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Soyluların böyle meseleleri hizmetkârlardan uzakta tartışması gerekmiyor mu?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
